translations.translation: to unleash upon them lumps of clay
So as to let loose clods of clay on them
that we may unleash a shower of clay-stones
to bring down upon them showers of marked lumps of clayy.
“To throw upon them stones of baked clay.”
To send down upon them stones of clay."
That we may send down upon them stone of clay,
to loose upon them stones of clay
That we may send upon them stones of clay,
so that we may bring down upon them a shower of stones of clay,
That we may send down upon them stones of baked clay.
that We may rain upon them stones of clay,
To bring on, on them, (a shower of) stones of clay (brimstone),
To send down upon them stones of baked clay.
so that we bring down stones of clay upon them
“To unleash upon them rocks of clay.”
To send down upon them stones of clay,
[51:33] that we may unleash upon them stones of clay, baked in fire,
(That we may send upon them stones of clay) cooked like bricks,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { مِّن طِينٍ مُّسَوَّمَةً } معناه مُعَلّمةٌ

translations.translation: And His saying - the Most High - {from a clay [that is] marked} means [that it is] taught

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وإنما أرسلنا { لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً } متحجرة { مِّن طِينٍ } [الذاريات: 33] يريد منه السجيل المركب من الحجر المسحوق مع الطين

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ لِنُرسل عليهم حجارةٌ من طين } أي: طين متحجر
 هو السجّيل
 وهو طينٌ طُبخ
 كما يُطبخ الآجر
 حتى صار في صلابة الحجارة
